publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3614 Mr Keith Harding: Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project—That the Parliament congratulates the Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project in Fife on successfully gaining Investors in People recognition following an independent assessment, especially as the commitment of staff and volunteers is so critical to providing the project’s vision and services.
S1M-3614 Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project (lodged on 20 November 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-3614 Mr Keith Harding: Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project—That the Parliament congratulates the Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project in Fife on successfully gaining Investors in People recognition following an independent assessment, especially as the commitment of staff and volunteers is so critical to providing the project’s vision and services. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3614 Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project (lodged on 20 November 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3614 Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project (lodged on 20 November 2002) Iain Smith*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-3614 Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project (lodged on 20 November 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
